name: Xero Current AR and AP
description: Provide Accounts Receivable & Payable for the current month. Also, compares average debtors and creditors for the current and last month. Originates from the Gallery.

xero-01.name: Xero Balance Sheet Report
xero-01.description: Returns a balance sheet for the current month. Originates from the Gallery.

xero-02.name: Xero Executive Summary Current and Last Month
xero-02.description: Provides a executive summary including monthly totals and some common business ratios. Originates from the Gallery.
